detail_desc: 5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a fake fly and tapered legs with decorative seams and ribbed hems.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut blouse in a linen weave with a wide neckline, covered buttons down the front, a concealed zip in one side and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey. Short sleeves with striped, ribbed trims.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs. Length approx. 55 cm, 65 cm and 75 cm.
Short, V-neck dress with a wrapover front, short flounced sleeves, a concealed fastening at the top and seam with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

V-neck, cold shoulder blouse in airy, crinkled fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and long sleeves with elastication and a flounce at the cuffs. Flounces at the front that continue back around the shoulders, an elasticated seam at the waist and flounce at the hem.
Bib-front blouse in an airy modal weave with a sheen. Small, frilled collar, a lace-trimmed V-shaped opening with ties at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a jacket and skirt in washed cotton denim. Straight-cut jacket with a collar, press-studs down the front, patch pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined. Skirt with covered elastication at the waist, a zip fly and press-stud and patch front and back pockets. Unlined.
Dress in a silk weave with a concealed zip at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Short trumpet sleeves and a tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Cropped, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved sweatshirt in a lightweight cotton blend with cut-out sections on the shoulders, a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless playsuit in viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck at the front, and a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and short legs.

Trousers in a viscose weave with wide covered elastication at the back of the waist, pleats at the top and a sewn-in tie belt with wide belt loops at the front. Diagonal side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and decorative elastic straps at the front.
Cropped top in sturdy jersey with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fabric trim at the hem.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a mesh back, mesh shoulder straps and a racer back with an elastic strap.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.

prod_name: ED Lyra HW wide leg trs
detail_desc: Trousers in a softly draping viscose weave. High waist with a small frill trim at the top, covered elastication and a drawstring. Diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with a hood, decorative ears, long sleeves and long legs. Zip at the front that continues down one leg, foldover mitts at the cuffs and full feet. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Suit trousers in wool twill with stitched details. Regular waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Hairbands in stretch cotton jersey with a sewn-on bow at the front.
Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft, printed jersey. Top with a round neckline, short sleeves and rounded hem. Longer at the back. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Round metal and plastic studs.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets and gently tapered legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs. The cotton content of the trunks is organic.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and press-studs at the sides. Chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and slim legs.

Double-breasted coat in a soft, Italian wool blend with notch lapels and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Welt side pockets with a flap and an inner pocket with a concealed button. Lined.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.

Straight-cut shirt jacket in felted fabric with a collar, press-studs down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The lining is made from recycled polyester.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Welt side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in suede with mesh details, lacing at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop front and back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Mules with wrapover faux fur straps, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shirt in a woven cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Long raglan sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, a frill-trimmed yoke at the back and an embroidered back section in woven fabric.
Scarf in a soft rib knit.

Long-sleeved, checked shirt in lightweight cotton twill with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, yoke with a pleat at the back, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood with a wrapover front that has decorative eyelets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers in a cotton weave with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric. Top with embroidery on the front and soft brushed inside. Seam at the waist and flared skirt in woven fabric.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, concealed press-studs on one shoulder, a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Imitation suede shopper with an imitation leather lower section. Handles and a magnetic fastener at the top and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Lined. Size approx. 35x39 cm.
Jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar, pockets in the side seams and 3/4-length gathered sleeves. No buttons. Lined.
Gently flared dress in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with a decorative bow at the neckline and short sleeves.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with an unlined hood. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Narrow, elasticated trim at the cuffs and hem.
Shorter satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the back and tapered puff sleeves with embroidery.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.

5-pocket skinny fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly with a press-stud, decorative stitching o the legs and decorative seams on the back pockets.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-style dress in a fine, sturdy knit containing glittery threads with dropped shoulders and wide balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Earrings in metal and patterned plastic. Length 5.5 cm.
Thong briefs in mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. 3/4-length sleeves with elasticated, trumpet cuffs with decorative bows. Short slits in the sides.
Fitted top in jersey with a wide neckline and short sleeves.
Pre-tied bow tie with an elastic strap and adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Width 10 cm.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace with round pendants. Adjustable length, 43-50 cm.
Corduroy jacket in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and adjustable tab with buttons at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Unlined.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Pyjamas with a top and pair of shorts in soft jersey. Straight-cut top with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits in the sides of the hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Imitation leather mules with narrow straps and covered heels.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Maxi dress in softly draping viscose jersey with narrow, tie-top shoulder straps. Unlined.
